Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Normal
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 119th, Wentworth and 115th: due to street blockage near 115th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 119th, Wentworth,115th and over regular route: due to street blockage near 115th/Normal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at State/Division
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temp rerouted in both directions via State, Oak, Dearborn, Division and resume normal route, due to street blockage near State/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via State, Oak, Dearborn, Division and resume normal route, due to street blockage near State/Division.

Headline: No trains between Garfield and 95th
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 87th and 95th due to a track condition. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 87th and 95th due to a track condition.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and 87th at this time.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through Garfield to 95th.
At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#29 State
See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Armitage
ShortDescription:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Armitage due to a door problem.
Personnel are working to restore service. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Armitage due to a door problem.
Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
